Description: The Avenue has all the elements you expect in a great home, and then some! A gated community, conference center, onsite laundry, updated apartment homes, on-site maintenance and great location are just a few of the amenities you'll come to love. You'll also relish in the Avenue's spacious units and perfect location. If you are looking for a home with value, comfort, and convenience, then search no more! Easy access to I-495 and public transportation give you complete convenience and relaxation. Look no further than The Avenue Apartments, if you are here you are home!

Description: Under New Management...Nestled in a quiet wooded setting, Admiral Place has the ideal apartment home for you. Located just off the Capital Beltway and convenient to Suitland Parkway. Admiral Place is only minutes from Andrews Air Force Base. Here you will find the Metrobus stop at your door and a washer and dryer in every apartment.

Pet Policy:
Dogs Allowed:
Pennbrooke Station is a dog and cat, pet-friendly community. We allow a maximum of 2 pets (dogs or cats) per apartment. Pet rent, deposits and breed restrictions apply. The following breed restrictions include dogs that are known to be aggressive towards strangers and / or children, or to be destructive in indoor environments. Pets that contain a mix of any of the breeds listed are not permitted. Restricted Pet Breeds are the following: * American Pit Bull Terrier, American Bulldog, Doberman Pincher, Rottweiler, German Shepherd, Tosa Inu, Staffordshire Terrier (American or Bull), Bull Terrior, Mastiff, Bullmastiff, Presa Canario, Cane Corso, Siberian Husky, Malamute, Wolf-Dog Hybrid, Great Dane, St. Bernard, Akita, Chow-Chow.

Description: Whatever you're looking for in an DC metro apartment, it's here and ready to go. A home that's got style, comfort and plenty of room. A community where families can enjoy their time together. And location in touch with city and countryside. At the Pennbrooke Station Apartments, you'll have all that - and more. Plus, you'll be surprised by just how affordable these remarkable homes are. Don't let this opportunity for high-quality apartment living pass you by. Make the move to Pennbrooke Station

Description: Convenience is at your doorstep at Surrey Square apartments in Forestville, Prince Georges County, located on Pennsylvania Avenue near Penn Mar Shopping Center and Penn Station Center. Our location is also just minutes from the attractions of the surrounding Washington D.C. area and is ideal for employees of nearby Andrews Air Force Base, UPS, Verizon, Maryland Hospital Center and the U.S. Census Bureau and students and faculty of Samuel P. Massey, one of the top rated schools in PG County. We have easy access to where you need to go via the Capital Beltway and Maryland Route 4, and bus stops at the front of our community, including a Metrobus that takes you directly to the nearby Suitland Metro station and beyond! Not only do we allow cats, but our pet fees are among the lowest around. Your home is waiting at Surrey Square apartments!

Description: Welcome to ideally located Walker Mill Apartments in Maryland. Here, you will find gorgeous one-, two- and three-bedroom District Heights apartments that offer you the ultimate combination of location and comfort. Now under new management with multi-million dollar renovations and upgrades underway.Our apartment homes are equipped with fantastic amenities such as private patios/balconies, wall-to-wall carpet, gas ranges, ceramic tile tubs/showers and large kitchens. In our beautifully landscaped community, you will find useful conveniences like laundry facilities, a playground, additional storage and close proximity to public transportation. Our award winning customer service and professional on-site staff make Walker Mill Apartments the perfect place to call home in Maryland!

Description:
Your new home awaits. The address is 7208 Donnell Pl, (C1) Forestville, MD.
It's a 2 bedroom, 1 bath condo that rents for $1350.00 per month plus electric. This unit has a wrap around style balcony and dishwasher. Tenant is responsible for electric only.
Neighborhood schools include Forestville Military Academy, Longfields Elementary School and Our Savior's School. The closest grocery stores are Shoppers, Giant, Target. Minutes away from Starbucks. 
Enjoy meals at Wendy's, Applebee's and Long John Silver's. 
Must see to appreciate, so CALL US for a viewing.
Unit features
* Microwave
* Hardwood floors
* Air conditioning
* Refrigerator
* Dishwasher
* Balcony, deck, patio
* Laundry room / hookups
* Oven / range
* Heat - gas
* Reserved Parking
Contact Loren Johnson
(202) 562-2779
(202) 945-7557
www.robtco.com

Description: Lorring Park is a garden-style apartment community offering spacious one, two and three bedroom apartment homes in Forestville. We have newly renovated apartments available for lease. Your new home features private patio, gas range cooking, dishwashers, all it needs it you! Lorring Park’s convenient location puts you minutes from Washington, DC, I-495, Andrews Air Force Base, local schools, shopping, dining and much more. When your done exploring the neighborhood, come home to lay by the pool, take the dog for a stroll, or do some laundry. Your options are endless here at Lorring Park Apartments.

Community offers 2 assigned parking 24 hour security & cameras. Close to metro & subway.

Description:
(202) 562-2779 - Your new home awaits. The address is 7208 Donnell Pl, (C1) Forestville, MD. It's a 2 bedroom, 1 bath condo that rents for $1350.00 per month plus electric. This unit has a wrap around style balcony and dishwasher. Tenant is responsible for electric only. Neighborhood schools include Forestville Military Academy, Longfields Elementary School and Our Savior's School. The closest grocery stores are Shoppers, Giant, Target. Minutes away from Starbucks. Enjoy meals at Wendy's, Applebee's and Long John Silver's. Must see to appreciate, so CALL US for a viewing. Unit features * Microwave * Hardwood floors * Air conditioning * Refrigerator * Dishwasher * Balcony, deck, patio * Laundry room / hookups * Oven / range * Heat - gas * Reserved Parking Contact Loren Johnson (202) 562-2779 (202) 945-7557 www.robtco.com
(RLNE3564716) Other Amenities - Parking, Patio, Balcony, Deck. Appliances - Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Refrigerator, Oven, Garbage Disposal, Microwave. Lease lengths - 12 Months. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Resident Pays Electricity. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.
